WITNESS: Detectives I. J. Jackson and K. L. King conducted the interrogations of suspects and potential witnesses. PROSECUTOR: Thank you. No further questions. The Defense commenced a detailed cross-examination of Lieutenant Adams concerning the investigative procedures. Throughout the trial, Patrol Officer M. N. Nelson, Patrol Officer O. P. Olson, and Patrol Officer Q. R. Roberts were also brought to testify.
